channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Monday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: JPMorgan thinks this Trump administration might actually be business-unfriendly
Trump pauses Mexico tariffs for one month after agreement on border troops
item.description: President Donald Trump over the weekend said he was imposing 25% tariffs on goods imported from Mexico and Canada, and a 10% tariff on goods from Chin...

item.title: Trump slaps tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing ahead with long-threatened import tariffs on goods from Canada, Mexico and China.

item.title: Mexico tariff reprieve tightens focus on Trump talk with Canada premier Trudeau
EU leaders meet to talk defense but Trump and his tariffs loom large
item.description: European leaders are gathering to discuss defense — but the latest moves by U.S. President Donald Trump will loom large over the meeting.

item.title: Ontario to remove U.S. alcohol from shelves after Trump's tariffs announcement
item.description: The Liquor Control Board of Ontario will remove American alcohol from its shelves in response to U.S. President Trump's tariffs on Canada.

item.title: Trump’s tariff moves upend inflation expectations in financial markets
ISM calls Trump tariffs a threat to manufacturing recovery
Odds nearly 50/50 that courts will block Trump’s tariffs, in Barclays view
